description: These quick and easy veal burgers are juicy, tender and perfect with healthy kale and apple slaw with a kick of horseradish.
name: Veal Burgers with Kale & Apple Slaw Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large red onion, peeled, half diced, half finely sliced
1 large apple, cored and finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the breadcrumbs, veal mince, half of the grated carrot and the diced red onion in a bowl with your hands. Shape into 4 patties and set aside.
Whisk the horseradish cream and yoghurt together, add the rest of carrots, sliced onions, kale and apple and mix well to coat.
Heat the oil in a large, non-stick pan on medium high heat and cook the veal burgers for 3-4 minutes on each side until cooked through. Serve on top of the slaw, or in a toasted bun if desired.
